## Problem / Use Case

What problem does this solve? What are you trying to do that the pipeline doesn't support?

## Proposed Solution

How would you like this to work? Be specific about behavior, config options, or CLI flags.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you tried any workarounds? Are there other approaches that might work?

## Additional Context

Any references, examples from other tools, or screenshots that help explain the request.
